content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing resources.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring resources to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure that the items you are trying to insert into a structure are present in your inventory. Check inventory levels before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly monitor and empty chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills. This will prevent interruptions in resource extraction.

### Errors when furnaces have no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of ingredients to smelt. Check the supply chain and inserter operations to maintain a steady flow of resources.
